General.Name: Xiamen Leading Optics Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Leading Optics Co., Ltd. provides optical solution worldwide. Its products include surveillance lens products, such as vari-focal, fixed-focal, and pinhole lenses, as well as automotive, machine vision, ITS, low distortion, and panoramic lens; and scanning recognition, UAV, and consumer imaging products. Xiamen Leading Optics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
